name: Grossland
description:
This game create on #GBJAM.

But missed the submission time. 

I improve it and publish it now. 

Probably 10 minutes of gameplay. Some enmies and 1 Boss.

I didn't test on Mac. If it has some bug on the Mac version let me know.

Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys — Move

SPACE — Attack

Enter -- Start Game

Xbox Gamepad Controls

D-Pad/Left Stick — Move

A — Attack  or Start Game

START - Restart Game

PS4 Gamepad Controls

D-Pad/Left Stick — Move

X — Attack  or Start Game

OPTION - Restart Game
